title: Metier Selects Yardi Voyager 7S for Asset and Property Management
text: Saturday, August 8, 2015 10:29AM IST (4:59AM GMT) Metier Selects Yardi Voyager 7S for Asset and Property Management Real estate group will use new platform to manage operations in Australia Sydney, Australia Metier, a full service real estate group that provides services to large retail and entertainment developments in Australia, selected Yardi Voyager ® 7S as its new asset, property management and trust accounting system. Yardi Voyager is a mobile-enabled, tablet-compatible Software as a Service platform. “We selected Voyager 7S because using a standardised technology platform to manage our dispersed portfolio is aligned with our business strategy of increasing value and the type of services we can provide clients. Other factors in our decision included 24/7 access to operational and financial data and Yardi’s local support structure in Australia,” said Darryll Ashworth, CEO at Metier. “We’re pleased to welcome Metier to our portfolio of clients in Australia. We look forward to working with Darryll and his team, and supporting Metier through their next phase of growth,” said Neal Gemassmer, vice president of international for Yardi. About Metier Metier, based in Perth, Australia, was established in 2002. The integrated property group specialises in master planning, leasing and managing retail and entertainment projects, ranging from greenfield neighbourhood centres anchored by ALDI or Woolworths, up to major mixed use CBD projects such as Perth City Link and Elizabeth Quay. For more information, visit www.metierconsult.com . About Yardi Now in its fourth decade, Yardi ® is committed to the design, development and support of software for real estate investment management and property management. With the Yardi Commercial Suite ™ , Yardi Residential Suite ™ , Yardi Investment Suite ™ and Yardi Orion ® Business Intelligence, the Yardi Voyager ® platform is a complete real estate management solution. It includes operations, accounting and services with portfolio-wide business intelligence and platform-wide mobility. Yardi serves clients worldwide from offices in Australia, Asia, Middle East, Europe and North America. For more information, visit www.yardi.com.au .
